title: Alarm Monitoring Block
description:
SIGN_I returns TRUE if the input value is negative. The input
values are of type DINT.
name: ALARM_2

input.name: X
input.description: The input value that is being monitored.

input.name: LO_1
input.description: The lower threshold for the first alarm.

input.name: HI_1
input.description: The upper threshold for the first alarm.

input.name: LO_2
input.description: The lower threshold for the second alarm.

input.name: HI_2
input.description: The upper threshold for the second alarm.

input.name: HYS
input.description: The hysteresis value applied to determine alarm state changes.

output.name: Q1_LO
output.description: Output indicating if the first low alarm is triggered.

output.name: Q1_HI
output.description: Output indicating if the first high alarm is triggered.

output.name: Q2_LO
output.description: Output indicating if the second low alarm is triggered.

output.name: Q2_HI
output.description: Output indicating if the second high alarm is triggered.
